kantha wirodhi githa widiyo aadiya wadanaya kirima bas riyawalata athul wana, pita wana wita ha aasana laba ganimedi kanthawanta ida no demin, pirimin aakramanashili lesa ida laba ganima bas riyawala welandam karana, sammadam, singaman yadina pudgalayan kanthawan apahasuthawata lak wana paridi katayuthu kirima bas riyawala liya ho kurutu ga athi waki, stikar aadiyen kanthawan apahasayata lak kirima awasarayakin thorawa jangama durakathanawalin kanthawange chayarupa ganima ha widiyo kirima sthri-purusha samajabhawaya anuwa sidu wana prachanda kriyawalata erehiwa katha karana kanthawan awagnyawata lak kirima podu prawahana sewawaladi sthri-purusha samajabhawaya anuwa prachandathwaya sidu wana thawath aakara da thibiya haki ya. 74%k dena podu pa්rawahana sewawaladi sidu wana lingika hinsana pilibanda paminili kala haki durakathana ankayak pilibanda no danna bawa ihatha dakwana lada samikshanayedi pawasa thibe.

anathuruwa shri lanka inime hudekala satanaka niratha wu anjalo mathiws lakunu 62k ras kala athara ohuta anagi sahayak dun jiwan mendis lakunu 48k laba gaththeya.pandu yawimedi tim bresnan lakunu 49kata kadulu 3k da, jems andarsan lakunu 55kata kadulu 2k da, jed daranbach lakunu 49kata kadulu 2k da dawa gathha.tharagaye wiraya sammanaya jonathan trotta himiwu athara tharagawaliye wiraya sammanaya alesteyar kukta himiwiya.engalanthaya kadulu 9k dawi (oowara 50) 268 - jonathan trot 72, oyin mogan 57, kreg kiswetar 43, alesteyar kuk 31 (suraj randiw 42/5, dhammika prasad 26/2)shri lankawa siyalu dena dawi (oowara 48.2) 252 - anjalo mathiws 62, dinesh chandimal 54, kumar sangakkara 48, jiwan mendis 48 (tim bresnan 49/3, jems andarsan 55/2, jed daranbach 49/2).
ema wasare siyalu pradanayan sahithawa rajya aadayama rupiyal biliyana 2175k lesa ganan bala thibe.

ma deshapalanayatath, nayakathwayatath unanduwak dakwimata diri ganwune owun wani nirbhitha kanthawan nisaweni.

1995 wasarehi srebrenicha hidi pirimi daruwanda athulu haththa dahakata adhika muslim purushayan mara damima saha jana sanharaya da athulu yuda aparadha chodana ekolahak rathko mladikta erehiwa idiripath wenawa.
dan me liyana gaman..
okkotama hapan me anthima kate mata kellektath hitha giyane.
indiya hamuda shri lankawe di sthri dushana, wadha hinsa paminawim saha manushya ghathana sidu kala bawata barapathala chodana ella wiya.
obama dinaka ehi gihin dasinma dakinna.
aniwaryayenma kiya wiya yuthuma lipiyak eeka.
eya mehi balanna.

wa. 04 wana siyawase kirthi shri meghawarna raju dawasa hemamala saha dantha kumarun wisin meratata wadama karana lada shri dalada wahanse anekuth pujya wasthun men sthupayak thula nidhan nokota, “dhammachakkageha” nam wu mulma dalada madura thula thanpathkota an ayata siyasin daka wandapuda gathahaki lesa pawathima nisath, suwasu dahasak dharmaskandhaye pahasa lada pujya wasthuwak wima nisath, dalada wahanse wishayehi aarambhaye sita sesu dhathun wahanselata wada suwishesha gaurawayak athi wannata hethu wuwa wiya haka.
aththenma dewani yanna meyata uchithama wisheshana padaya wiya.

gettuwa kittuwa thanaka nawatha jakattuwath helmatayath ee matha thaba mada durak payin awida gos uthsawa shalawata giya mata, maha warshawe ethanata aapahu ya haki magak hitha gatha nohaki wuna. kokatath kiyala shalawen iwathata awith, the koppayak bona athare sammanalabhi kiwindu damith gunawardhanath ohuge aadaraniya daru pawulath samaga samichi kathawak pawathwa, weni ayiya, oonaya ayiya, manoj malli athulu hithawathun samaga wachanayak dekak huwamaru karagena waha waha pahala mahalata aawe ya haki magak soya ganna oona wu nisayi.

mema papadi dhawanaya parlimenthu watarawuma pasukara rajagiriya haraha kasal widiya, kanaththa watarawuma pasukara bauddhaloka mawathe malalasekara mawatha widuli sangnya asalin dakunata hari nidahas chathurasrayata prawesha wiya.apata galapenala ratata galapena parisara hithakami sama prawahana madhyakma janapriya karawima rajayaka wagakima bawath ee sadaha purwadarshayak sapayamin idiriyedi katayuthukarana bawath amathi patali champika ranawaka mahatha sadahan kara sitiye kilomitar 11.02 k dura sarthakawa pa padi dhawanaya awasan kota nidahas chathurasra bhumiyata paminimen pasuwaya.
